title: In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2023 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2023.

title: In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous

2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous

title: In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous
heading: 3. The 1st day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 1st day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2023 shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1 (insofar as it is not already in operation); 

(b) Part 2; 

(c) Part 4 (other than insofar as subparagraph (i) of subsection (3)(j) 
of section 10 of the Non-Fatal Offences against the Person Act 
1997 (No. 26 of 1997) amended by section 23 relates to Part 5 
of the Act of 2023); 

(d) Part 6; 

(e) Part 8; 

(f) 

section 60, other than the following provisions of paragraph (a): 

(i) 

subparagraph (ii), and 

(ii) 

subparagraph (iii), insofar as it relates to the insertion, in 
paragraph (e) of the definition of “relevant offence” in 
section 12(1) of the Criminal Evidence Act 1992 (No. 12 
of 1992), of a reference to paragraph (db) of that 
definition; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 (g) 

sections 63, 64, 66 to 68, 70, 72, 73, 75, 76 (other than 
paragraph (d)), 77, 79, 80, 81, 82(b), 83 to 85 and 87. 

[525] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 October, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [525] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH
